detectors.description:
DollarCostAverage.__calculateFees(uint256) (src/DollarCostAverage.sol#830-845) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- fee = (amount * s_fee) / PRECISION (src/DollarCostAverage.sol#841)
	- protocolFee = (fee * s_contractFeeShare) / PRECISION (src/DollarCostAverage.sol#842)
detectors.markdown:
[DollarCostAverage.__calculateFees(uint256)](src/DollarCostAverage.sol#L830-L845) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [fee = (amount * s_fee) / PRECISION](src/DollarCostAverage.sol#L841)
	- [protocolFee = (fee * s_contractFeeShare) / PRECISION](src/DollarCostAverage.sol#L842)

detectors.description:
NodeSequencer.takeBlockNumbers(uint256) (src/NodeSequencer.sol#203-252) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- startBlockNumber == block.number (src/NodeSequencer.sol#222-224)

DollarCostAverage.__checkPairs(address,address,address) (src/DollarCostAverage.sol#791-822) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- factory.getPair(token1,token2) == address(0) (src/DollarCostAverage.sol#798)

DollarCostAverage.__validateRecurringBuy(IDollarCostAverage.RecurringBuy) (src/DollarCostAverage.sol#771-783) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- recBuy.status == Status.SET && ! (recBuy.paymentDue > block.timestamp) && ! (IERC20(recBuy.tokenToSpend).balanceOf(recBuy.sender) < recBuy.amountToSpend) && ! (IERC20(recBuy.tokenToSpend).allowance(recBuy.sender,address(this)) < recBuy.amountToSpend) (src/DollarCostAverage.sol#774-782)

		- (success,data) = token.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(IERC20(token).approve.selector,to,amount)) (src/Security.sol#194-196)

		- (success,data) = token.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(IERC20(token).approve.selector,to,amount)) (src/Security.sol#194-196)

		- amounts = dexRouter.swapExactTokensForTokens(buyAmount,amountOutMin,path,to,block.timestamp) (src/DollarCostAverage.sol#507-513)
